properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 7:42PM CST until January 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood
Advisory for the East Branch Du Page River...

East Branch Du Page River at Bolingbrook affecting Du Page and
Will Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The East Branch Du Page River at Bolingbrook, or from Maple Avenue
in Lisle downstream to confluence with West Branch DuPage River.
* until Monday evening.
* At  615 PM Friday the stage was 15.1 feet.
* Action stage is 18.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 19.5 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near 19.2 feet by Sunday
afternoon.
* Impact...At 19.5 feet...Royce Road is threatened west of the River
near Bolingbrook.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
